tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB sow) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT every) (NN #heart))) (S (VP (VB give) (S (NP (NP (DT a) (NN #true)) (CC and) (NP (JJ #sincere) (NN #compliment))) (VP (TO to) (VP (VB #everyone) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VB meet) (NP-TMP (NN today))))))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [sow/VB mark>to/TO nmod:in>[#heart/NN case>in/IN det>every/DT] ccomp>[give/VB dobj>[#true/NN det>a/DT cc>and/CC conj:and>[#compliment/NN amod>#sincere/JJ]] dobj>#compliment/NN xcomp>[#everyone/VB mark>to/TO ccomp>[meet/VB nsubj>you/PRP nmod:tmod>today/NN]]] punct>./.]
